title: Google Phone & Messages address potential privacy concerns, reduce call & message metadata collection
content:
In response to a research paper outlining the data collected by Google’s Phone and Messages apps, including call and text records, the company has updated both apps to better respect privacy.

more…

The post Google Phone & Messages address potential privacy concerns, reduce call & message metadata collection appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After research outlined data collected by Google's Phone & Messages apps, including call & text records, both apps increased their privacy.
